title: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine: Things To Know Before You Come
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come             Things To Know Before You Come       Pets are welcome on the fort grounds, but not in the historic area. This area is defined by the wooden fence which surrounds the fort. Both the Visitor Center and the fort are accessible to wheelchairs. The Accessibility link offers more details.
